name: HappyLand
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
HappyLand - a Blockchain Gaming platform, inspired by the Texas countryside - USA.
In HappyLand, players will transform into the role of a farm owner cultivating, breeding pets and taking care of his farm.
From there, each player will participate in building an multi-farm metaverse with many unique custom styles.
